column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I ordered a beer and an order of the pig candy
column2: which was delicious! I don't think I saw it on the menu
column3: but I know they'd had it before (and truth be told
column4: it was the reason I returned) so I asked if they still had it - and they thankfully did. If you're looking for some deliciously sticky sweet pork belly
column5: this is the dish you want. It comes with kimchi
column6: but is delicious all on its own. Definitely recommend!
